code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{Button,Input}from"../components/ui";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddNote=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[content,setContent]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const addNote=async()=>{if(!title.trim()||!content.trim())return;try{await axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/notes`,{title,content});navigate("/");}catch(error){console.error("Error adding note:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-900 text-white p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-full max-w-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-green-400 mb-4",children:"\uD83D\uDCDD Add New Note"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-300 text-sm font-semibold mb-2",children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter note title",className:"mb-4 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 text-white"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-gray-300 text-sm font-semibold mb-2",children:"Content"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter note content",className:"w-full p-3 rounded-lg bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 text-white h-32 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-end gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:addNote,className:"bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg shadow",children:"\u2705 Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),className:"bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-lg shadow",children:"\u274C Cancel"})]})]})});};export default AddNote;
